gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.jdbc
Class JdbcPersistenceWorker<PO extends PersistentObject<?>>

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.workers.AbstractBaseWorker
      gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.workers.AbstractResourceConsumer
          gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.jdbc.AbstractJdbcWorker
              gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.jdbc.JdbcPersistenceWorker<PO>
Type Parameters:
PO -
All Implemented Interfaces:
PersistenceUtility<PO>, PersistenceWorker<PO>, Worker
public abstract class JdbcPersistenceWorker<PO extends PersistentObject<?>>
extends AbstractJdbcWorker
implements PersistenceWorker<PO>

Abstract implementation of PersistenceWorker based on JDBC.

getDetachStrategy

public DetachStrategy getDetachStrategy()
Description copied from interface: PersistenceWorker
Gets the DetachStrategy associated with this PersistenceWorker. The DetachStrategy is needed in order to re-attach a PersistentObject to its Provider. This is necessary for persistent objects that need the provider, like Hibernate disconnected objects.

Specified by:
getDetachStrategy in interface PersistenceWorker<PO extends PersistentObject<?>>
Returns:
Returns the DetachStrategy associated with this PersistenceWorker.
